alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 4:34PM MDT until May 27 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 433 PM MDT, a high based shower was located near Pueblo Depot, or 9 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 426 PM a 65 mph wind gust was reported at the Pueblo Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eastern Pueblo, Boone, Avondale and Pueblo Depot. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with this storm will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
